value:
My dear, beloved Lucia! I cannot bear
to ruminate on how our continued
separation must leave you wretched!

I had prepared enough funds to make
General Ike disappear were he a
miscreant seeking power in Crimea.$k$pHowever, given how things turned
out in the end, it seems that my fears
were quite unfounded.

The day after the fateful battle at
Nados Castle, I led a band of soldiers
in a detailed survey of the ruins.$k$pAnd yet, despite our best efforts, we
could locate neither hide nor hair of
the Black Knight's corpse...

By your leave, my comrades and I
shall retire for a moment of respite
once the sun is below the horizon.

I plan to sample a rare Askran drink in
the comfort of my modest—and
provisional—accommodations here.$k$pPerhaps you would do me the honor
of joining me?

Why, yes, I am a traveling performer!
Stilts, a jack-in-the-box, beanbags...
I have it all! Shall we "shock" hands?

Brave and noble warriors of Crimea,
keep your spirits high! My comrades
and I are here to rally behind you!$k$pTogether we shall renew our oaths in
service to our sacred kingdom!

You are in the presence of Bastian,
the count of Fayre. Behold my deep
devotion to the Crimean royal family!

Alas, though my quick-witted mind is
a veritable font of all-encompassing
knowledge, it falls short in one area.$k$pWoe is me, for the words it conjures
to my lips, no matter how sweet, will
not penetrate my beloved's heart!

You wish to see my beaming smile?
Without further ado... BANG! Joy
bursts from my heart akin to confetti!

You address Bastian, the count of
Fayre. Please excuse the discourtesy
of my unannounced arrival.

Geoffrey is both my friend and the
greatest paladin in all Crimea. Lucia is
the singular aim of my affections.$k$pThe public has showered them both
with praise for their noble actions in
service to Her Majesty the queen.$k$pAlongside fellow patriots, I swore
deliverance for my kingdom. But I
would be remiss not to extol him...$k$pI speak of the famed heroic general
who must be kept foremost in mind
when discussing war effort impact.$k$pSullied with the disgrace of abiding
Crimea's occupation, we were once
ready to make the ultimate sacrifice.$k$pThough we despaired, he pushed us
to reconsider what we fought to save,
and whom we fought to protect.$k$pHis storm of passion pierced through
the dark clouds and nourished our
barren hearts. How moving it was!$k$pIf I may, the skills of retainers and
heroes are only necessary when
nations devolve into chaos.$k$pThough our fate is tied to that of the
kingdom, we should strive for the day
when our services are unneeded.$k$pThat being said, esteemed summoner,
allow me to give a word of advice. Do
not let smoldering embers lie.$k$pDiscern what simmers behind the
scenes, and—FOO!—snuff out flames
before they erupt into an inferno.$k$pOne cannot accomplish such delicate
work through overt means. No, you
must rely on manipulation and deceit.$k$pBut fear not, for I will volunteer my
services for expressly that purpose.
Please, do consider what I have said.
My dearest condolences.
Huzzah!
For our fair sun!
The end comes anon!
My glorious life...
I am Bastian, the count of Fayre. I was but a humble courtier in the service of Prince Renning.
If this is your manner of greeting, I suppose you could do worse.
I have worked out a strategy. Everything for the future of Crimea...

My dear friend Geoffrey is a true knight.
The very essence of composure.
Duke Renning was next in line to succeed the throne of Crimea...
Ah, my dear, beloved Lucia! It pains me to imagine your piteous tears during those cold, lonely nights without me!
Summoner, a toast. To the crazed whims of our shared destiny!
A clever ploy!
Well, well, well.
We shall test their mettle.
